name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior iOS Developer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **Swift**, **UIKit**, and **SwiftUI** for building high-performance mobile applications. Expert in developing **RESTful APIs** and handling data with **Core Data** and **JSON**. Proficient in implementing **MVVM** design patterns and best practices including **SOLID principles** and **GCD** for effective concurrency management. Experienced in securing applications with **OAuth 2**, **PKCE**, and **SSO**, ensuring adherence to security best practices. Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and agile methodologies, along with a proven track record in **CI/CD** practices. Passionate about contributing to the **FinTech** sector and leveraging technology for impactful software solutions.

Additionally skilled in utilizing **Git** for version control, **Xcode** for development, and using **Instruments** for performance tuning. Committed to maintaining a high standard of code quality through **Unit Testing** and **UI Testing**, while also recognizing the importance of open-source contributions in driving innovation and collaboration.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and developed iOS applications using **Swift**, **UIKit**, and **SwiftUI**, ensuring compliance with **mobile UI/UX principles** and delivering high-quality user experiences through adherence to **SOLID principles**.
• Implemented **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration with backend services, utilizing **JSON** for data exchange and ensuring efficient application performance.
• Coordinated with cross-functional teams in an **Agile methodology** environment to rapidly design, prototype, and iterate on features, enhancing user engagement in the **FinTech** sector.
• Employed concurrency techniques such as **GCD** and **Async Await** to optimize app responsiveness and improve smoothness in user interactions within complex financial applications.
• Familiar with advanced authentication and security practices including **OAuth 2**, **PKCE**, and **SSO** to safeguard sensitive user data, complying with industry-standard security **best practices**.
• Developed and executed unit and UI testing strategies using **Xcode** integrated tools, ensuring reliability and maintainability of applications across **iOS versions** 13 to 16.
• Collaborated with design and product teams to incorporate user feedback into rapid iterations of app features, leveraging knowledge of the **FinTech sector** to address user needs effectively.
• Managed version control and continuous integration through **Git** and **CI/CD** practices, facilitating smooth deployments and open-source contributions to enhance community engagement.
• Optimized application performance using **Instruments** to monitor and address memory usage, ensuring optimal responsiveness and reliability in high-traffic situations.
• Contributed to discussions on mobile application architecture and design patterns, applying insights from various technical conferences to foster improvements within the development team.
